content.text: What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to read cookbooks for recipe inspiration.
That's great! I love to read and cook. I am a brunette who loves to organize and stand out in a crowd with my leather clothes.
I love to collect books to keep my reading ability sharp. I am not close to my family but I want to be.
I'm sorry to hear that. I am close to my mother and love to spend time with her.
I didn't spend much time with my family, but I improved my English and made a lot of new friends.
That's great! I used to be a nurse, but I quit my job to pursue my passion for music.
Wow, that's amazing! What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and sing. I love to write songs.
That's so cool! I love to listen to music
